edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.workspace.main
Interface Workspace

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkspaceImpl
public interface Workspace

The workspace collection of submodules where episodic memories, recent contents of conscious, and the current situational model is stored. A workspace should be interfaceable with codelets which operate on the contents of these submodules.

Author:
ryanjmccall
